text: "Love over Gold" is a 1982 single by British rock band Dire Straits and is the title track to their fourth studio album Love over Gold. The live version was released as a single in 1984. It went to number 50 in the United Kingdom, number 43 in the Netherlands, number 15 in France and number 29 in New Zealand. ==References== Category:1982 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Dire Straits songs
title: Love over Gold (song)
